Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Is the purification target still alive and well, Bianca?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Just this moment, Commander Nikola gave me direct orders.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'For one, to lower the possible losses. And two...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'To determine if the target is a potential threat. And if it is, then we will perform purification.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If you go back on your word...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Can't help it, dear. They're orders from the top, I can't go against that. Of course, your little ticket is still in effect, so I won't be doing it myself directly.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Answer my question, Bianca, is the target still alive?', 4: '2'}
